title: (x) Ubiquitous hand-written style font - House Brush {Mike Y}
content:
This one is probably an easy one, but it's been annoying me.

[http://img.skitch.com/20100209-pqdju4nj7cti775p48e9dnnb7p.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304071724/http:/img.skitch.com/20100209-pqdju4nj7cti775p48e9dnnb7p.jpg "http://img.skitch.com/20100209-pqdju4nj7cti775p48e9dnnb7p.jpg")

Any ideas?
author: masony

comments.content:
I think it looks like [House Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304071724/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts) from the House Sign Painter set.

- Mike Yanega
